item.title: Putin and Kim join China's Xi for powerful show of anti-U.S. force
item.description: China's Xi Jinping has invited Vladimir Putin and North Korea's Kim Jong Un for a display of power, and the rising tide of anti-Western sentiment.

item.title: Firing squad execution of prisoner with dementia blocked by Utah court
item.description: The Utah Supreme Court blocked a death row inmate's upcoming execution, after the inmate's attorneys argued his dementia has significantly worsened.

item.title: Drones blasting rock music help scare wolves away from cattle
item.description: Biologists are using drones to blast AC/DC's "Thunderstruck" and movie clips at the apex predators to shoo them away from cattle.

item.title: Maps show how Texas, California redistricting could affect congressional seats
item.description: See maps of how Texas and California's push could play out, based on the 2024 election results.

item.title: Former CDC directors and acting directors raise concerns in op-ed over RFK Jr.'s decisions
item.description: In a New York Times op-ed, nine former CDC directors and acting directors who served under both Republican and Democratic administrations are voicing ...
